attributes.action: Reverse defence cuts to the armed forces
attributes.additional_details:
We Petition Her Majesty's government to immediately stop and reverse the defence cuts experienced by our armed forces!

The armed forces are no longer able to fulfil the roll of defence of the realm, along with other deployments around the world, they are far to over stretched and at breaking point!

We want Her Majesty's Government to immediately bring funding to the armed forces back to pre SDSR levels!
